title: Can I buy rp with 25$ gift card?
body: I just wonder that can I buy rp with 25$ gift cards because there are only 5$, 10$, 20$. 35%, 50$ and 100$.

replies.body: What kind of gift card do you have? o.o

25$ subway gift cards 
can i purchase with this?

Yup, you should have no issues using that card to grab some RP using [Openbucks.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-)

Let me know if you run into any issues.

but in the section that i can purchase rp with gift cards in league of legends client, there are just 5, 10, 20, 35, 50, 100$. there are not 25$ in the purchasing rp section. 
So what should i do to purchase rp with 25$?
You can purchase $20 of RP, then $5 if you still have it left.
